Name: Garbage Truck Simulator
About the game: Fill the compactor with trash and keep pressing the button until everything has been smashed Realtime fracturing without prefabricated debris Randomly generated street collection with almost 300 different trash items Keep the streets clean and choose between 3 authentic garbage trucks with different sounds and compaction systems. Fill the compactor with trash and keep pressing the button until everything has been smashed. Drive the truck from one stop to the next and collect every piece trash along the route. Or try one of the challenging missions to clear a doctor's office, bar or apartment as fast as possible. 3 authentic trash trucks with different sounds and compaction systems: 2R, Vulture and Shark Street collection with randomly generated environment and different trash piles for endless compaction fun Challenging clearing missions : Doctor's office, bar and apartment Realtime destruction without prefabricated debris chunks Realtime mesh deformers for squeezable objects Different kinds of trash: Bulk waste, residential and recycling Almost 300 different trash items to collect and smash Compare your performance with players worldwide on Steam leaderboards
